Job Title: Corporate Affairs Director, Research

Location: Thousand Oaks, CA

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Other, Public Relations, Strategy/Planning

Description:
HOW MIGHT YOU DEFY IMAGINATION?

If you feel like you’re part of something bigger, it’s because you are. At Amgen, our shared mission—to serve patients—drives all that we do. It is key to our becoming one of the world’s leading biotechnology companies. We are global collaborators who achieve together—researching, manufacturing, and delivering ever-better products that reach over 10 million patients worldwide. It’s time for a career you can be proud of.

Corporate Affairs Director, Research

Live

What You Will Do

Let’s do this! Let’s change the world! In this vital role you will be the key communication counselor focusing on our Research organization, the function that discovers the breakthrough therapies that transform the lives of patients. Research is undergoing significant transformation to accelerate the ability to bring much-needed therapies to all patients sooner. In this role, this individual will develop and implement strategic communication plans to ensure that audiences better understand and appreciate the innovation happening in research and how Amgen Research is uniquely positioned at this hinge moment where biology is meeting tech. This individual will work closely with the Research Senior Leadership Team to develop and deliver a consistent and compelling narrative about the efforts we are making to innovate all aspects drug discovery.

You will use your love of both science and communications to develop meaningful stories that elevate Amgen’s position as a leader in scientific research and innovation and generate excitement internally and externally.

This position reports to the Vice President, Corporate Affairs, Science & Innovation, with a dotted line to the SVP Research.

Location: Thousand Oaks or west coast are highly preferred as these align with Amgen's largest research population and clients.

Responsibilities:

Develop communications strategies and plans that effectively and consistently communicate to targeted key audiences and stakeholders about the science and innovation going on in research. Once fully vetted and approved, flawlessly execute on those plans and deliver measurable results.Develop and support executive engagement plan for Research SVP and key VPs, including proactively preparing company spokespeople via media training / presentation skills.Partner with the media relations team to address incoming media requests related to research and proactively work to garner press coverage with trade press to elevate Amgen as very much part of the wave of transformation sweeping drug discovery.Partner with the product communications team and therapeutic leads on therapeutic area strategy and positioning.Manage and direct public relations agency partners to assure maximum impact and assistance in reaching desired communications goals and objectives.Work in partnership with Research leaders and HR on employee engagement / internal communications.Partner successfully with investor relations to ensure consistency of messages to external audiences including media and financial world

Win

What We Expect Of You

We are all different, yet we all use our unique contributions to serve patients. The Communications professional we seek will have these qualifications.

Basic Qualifications:

Doctorate degree & 4 years of communications or public relations experience

Or

Master’s degree & 7 years of communications or public relations experience

Or

Bachelor’s degree or & 10 years of communications or public relations experience

Preferred Qualifications:

Degree in public relations, communications or journalismexperience working in-house or within a PR agencyBiotechnology, pharmaceutical or healthcare product public relations including corporate experience highly desiredHands on experience scientific / research communications desirableStrong oral and presentation skills; ability to negotiate and persuadeOutstanding writing skills and proven media relations skills that are results-orientedStrategic and creative thinker with ability to develop actionable programs that integrate soundly with business objectivesAbility to efficiently navigate a challenging and dynamic environment, and deal with rapidly changing prioritiesAbility to interact with all levels of management and manage staff and vendorsAbility to think quickly, analytically and creatively to accommodate a dynamic communications environmentExcellent interpersonal skills; enthusiastic, team player and self-starter; serious dedication to hard work and excellence

Thrive

What You Can Expect Of Us

As we work to develop treatments that take care of others, we also work to care for our teammates’ professional and personal growth and well-being.

The expected annual salary range for this role in the U.S. (excluding Puerto Rico) is posted. Actual salary will vary based on several factors including but not limited to, relevant skills, experience, and qualifications.

Amgen offers a Total Rewards Plan comprising health and welfare plans for staff and eligible dependents, financial plans with opportunities to save towards retirement or other goals, work/life balance, and career development opportunities including:

Comprehensive employee benefits package, including a Retirement and Savings Plan with generous company contributions, group medical, dental and vision coverage, life and disability insurance, and flexible spending accounts.A discretionary annual bonus program, or for field sales representatives, a sales-based incentive planStock-based long-term incentivesAward-winning time-off plans and bi-annual company-wide shutdownsFlexible work models, including remote work arrangements, where possible

Apply now

for a career that defies imagination

Objects in your future are closer than they appear. Join us.

We will ensure that individuals with disabilities are provided reasonable accommodation to participate in the job application or interview process, to perform essential job functions, and to receive other benefits and privileges of employment. Please contact us to request accommodation.
